metadata.title: CVE-2023-0042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 11.4 prior to 15.5.7, 15.6 prior to 15.6.4, and 15.7 prior to15.7.2. GitLab Pages allows redirection to arbitrary protocols.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
